movies.title: The Wedding Waltz
movies.plot: Viltteri, a balding guy in his thirties living in rural northern Finland, is hopelessly clueless about his new role as a married man and the father of a newborn son. A perfect escape from family responsibilities is having to get his old Hillman Minx repaired and inspected for road-worthiness, with a little help from an eccentric bunch of friends who never seem to have grown up either.
movies.simplePlot: Viltteri, a balding guy in his thirties living in rural northern Finland, is hopelessly clueless about his new role as a married man and the father of a newborn son. A perfect escape from ...

biography.bio: Vesa Vierikko was born on May 24, 1956 in Lappeenranta, Finland as Vesa Tapio Vierikko. He is an actor and writer, known for Guerre d'hiver (1989), The Match Factory Girl (1990) and The Flight Before Christmas (2008). He was previously married to Ilona Lampi.
biography.name: Vesa Vierikko

biography.bio: Sulevi Peltola was born on December 7, 1946 in Viljakkala, Finland as Sulevi Antero Peltola. He is an actor and director, known for Kotikatu (1995), Blue Corner (2002) and Frozen Land (2005). He was previously married to Raija-Sinikka Rantala.
biography.name: Sulevi Peltola

biography.bio: Markku Maalismaa was born on April 6, 1955 in Yli-Ii, Finland. He is an actor, known for Woman in the Meadow (2003), Raid (2003) and The Wedding Waltz (1988). He has been married to Liisa Vihmanen since 1987. They have two children.
biography.name: Markku Maalismaa

biography.bio: Kaija Pakarinen was born on January 7, 1954 in Rääkkylä, Finland as Kaija Pirkko Anneli Pakarinen. She is an actress, known for The Man Without a Past (2002), Lettres au Père Jacob (2009) and Ihmisten puolue (2008).
biography.name: Kaija Pakarinen

biography.bio: Taneli Mäkelä was born on March 10, 1959 in Espoo, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Guerre d'hiver (1989), Team Ahma (1998) and Ihmisten puolue (2008). He has been married to Anna-Maija Pentti since 1989. They have two children.
biography.name: Taneli Mäkelä

biography.bio: Tuula Nyman was born on April 16, 1943 in Helsinki, Finland as Tuula Elisabet Nyman. She was an actress, known for One Man's War (1973), Splendeur et misère de la humaine (1988) and Les vacances (1976). She was married to Vesa-Matti Loiri. She died on September 28, 2014 in Finland.
biography.name: Tuula Nyman

biography.bio: Veikko Kerttula was born on July 23, 1940 in Tampere, Finland as Veikko Juhani Kerttula. He is a director and writer, known for Simpauttaja (1975), Pakolaiset (1977) and Se tavallinen tarina (1972). He was previously married to Marjut Jokelainen and Tupuna Vaissi.
biography.name: Veikko Kerttula

biography.bio: Taisto Aho was born on April 4, 1926 in Mynämäki, Finland. He was an actor, known for Räpsy et Dolly (1990), The Wedding Waltz (1988) and Viimeinen keikka (1984). He died on July 19, 2004.
biography.name: Taisto Aho

biography.bio: Thomas Backlund was born on March 5, 1950 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor, known for The Wedding Waltz (1988), Falkenswärds möbler (2000) and Sommartider (2000).
biography.name: Thomas Backlund

biography.bio: Anna Grönblom is an actress, known for The Wedding Waltz (1988), Bergströms (1972) and Hur skall det gå för Bergströms? (1988).
biography.name: Anna Grönblom

biography.bio: Eeva-Maija Haukinen was born on February 3, 1944 in Nivala, Finland as Eeva-Maija Tyhtilä. She is an actress and writer, known for When the Heavens Fell (1972), The Rose of the Rascal (2001) and Irti maasta (1990). She was previously married to Erkki Pajala and Pekka Haukinen.
biography.name: Eeva-Maija Haukinen

biography.bio: Sari Havas was born on January 25, 1962 in Kolari, Finland as Sari Kirsi Katariina Havas. She is an actress and writer, known for Puhtaat valkeat lakanat (1993), Les gros durs (1999) and Flowers and Binding (2004). She has been married to Pertti Sveholm since 1993. They have two children.
biography.name: Sari Havas

biography.bio: Elina Hoffrén was born on August 14, 1927 in Kajaani, Finland. She is an actress, known for The Tug of Home: The Famous Niskavuori Saga (1984), The Wedding Waltz (1988) and The River (2001).
biography.name: Elina Hoffrén

biography.bio: Jorma Koho was born on December 4, 1937 in Helsinki, Finland as Jorma Antero Koho. He is an actor, known for The Wedding Waltz (1988), Ammattimies (2000) and Pakolaiset (1977).
biography.name: Jorma Koho

biography.bio: Kari Laiho is an actor, known for The Wedding Waltz (1988), Nollatoleranssi (2004) and Kotikatu (1995).
biography.name: Kari Laiho
